required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Real World Study Based on NGS (TRUMPRWS)
clinical_study.official_title: TRUMPRWS: A Non-interventional Study on Genetic Variants and Its Clinical Relevance in Chinese Patients With Advanced NSCLC (TRUMPRWS)

brief_summary.textblock: This is a descriptive observational study, in which data are collected in an epidemiological fashion. This study does not intend to alter or intervene the current medical practice of the recruited patients. Data will be collected in prospective manner.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a descriptive observational study, in which data are collected in an epidemiological fashion. This study does not intend to alter or intervene the current medical practice of the recruited patients. Data will be collected in prospective manner.
The eligible patients will be recruited after NGS analysis for tumor tissue and the inform-consent is obtained. The study required information will be collected (every 3 months).

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical relevance between genomic profiling and overall survival
primary_outcome.time_frame: [ Time Frame: From registration onto that step until death, or censored at the date of last contact, assessed up to 3 years]
primary_outcome.description: Kaplan-meier analysis of overall survival based on different genetic alteration

secondary_outcome.measure: The characteristics of genomic variation and dynamic changes during different anti-tumor treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Subtypes, incidence and dynamic changes of genomic variants during treatment process.

clinical_study.condition: Non-Small Cell Carcinoma of Lung, TNM Stage 4

intervention.intervention_name: No treatment is included in this protocol.
intervention.description: No drug intervention or tissue sampling will be included in this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients must be â‰¥20 years of age.
2. Provision of fully informed consent prior to any study specific procedures.
3. Histologically or cytologically confirmed, unresectable stage IIIB or stage IV NSCLC.
4. Genetic variants of tumor tissue detected by NGS.
Exclusion Criteria:
None.

facility.name: Guangdong Lung Cancer Institute, Guangdong Provincial People's Hospital, Guangdong Academy of Medical Sciences, School of Medicine, South China University of Technology
